name: Turn Control
title: Yelan: Turn Control
inPlayDescription: Roll Phase: If Yelan, who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Die will be rolled as <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Omni Element for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yelan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Yelan, equip this card.After Yelan equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Lingering Lifeline once.Roll Phase: If Yelan, who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Dice will be rolled as <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Omni Element for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)(You must have Yelan in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
